key_risks: Material weaknesses in internal controls over financial reporting
Ongoing stockholder lawsuits related to financial disclosures
Supply chain disruptions due to global semiconductor shortages
Intense competition from larger players like Ciena, Huawei, and Nokia
Dependence on key customers such as AT&T, Verizon, Google, and Facebook
controversies: Multiple law firms investigating potential claims against Infinera
Concerns over the long-term integration risks following Nokia's acquisition
governance_issues: Material weaknesses in internal controls over financial reporting
Potential cultural clashes post-acquisition by Nokia

sources.title: Infinera Corporation Reports Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results
sources.snippet: Infinera Corporation Reports Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results . San Jose, Calif. - November 5, 2024, 4:03 p.m. ET - Infinera Corporation (NASDAQ: INFN) today released financial results for its third quarter ended September 28, 2024. GAAP revenue for the quarter was $354.4 million compared to $342.7 million in the second quarter of 2024 and $392.4 million in the third quarter of 2023.
